gui

Interface PlayfieldDisplay

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PlayfieldPanel

    public interface PlayfieldDisplay
    An interface that every class, which is capable of displaying a playfield in some way, has to implement.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void updateDisplay()
      Updates the whole board.
      void updateField(int x, int y)
      Updates a specific field on the board.

    • Method Detail

      • updateDisplay

        void updateDisplay()
        Updates the whole board.

      • updateField

        void updateField(int x,
                 int y)
        Updates a specific field on the board.

        Parameters:
        x - An integer variable which is representing a point on the vertical axis of the playfield.
        y - An integer variable which is representing a point on the horizontal axis of the playfield.
